meta.title: Join Flux 1.1 PRO Waitlist | Advanced AI Image Generator
meta.description: Due to high demand, Flux 1.1 PRO is currently at capacity. Join our waitlist for a chance to receive free trial credits once approved.

waitlist.title: Join Flux 1.1 PRO Waitlist
waitlist.description: We're experiencing unprecedented demand for Flux 1.1 PRO. To ensure the best experience for all users, we've temporarily paused free trials. Join our waitlist, and upon approval, we'll provide you with free trial credits as soon as possible.
waitlist.successMessage: Thank you for joining our waitlist! We'll review your application and send free trial credits once approved.
